Class SpiderSQLWorkload

  |

All Implemented Interfaces:
IWorkloadStorable
public class SpiderSQLWorkload
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWorkloadStorable

This class uses a JDBC database to store a spider workload. Copyright 2001-2003 by Jeff Heaton (http://www.jeffheaton.com)

Version:
1.2
Author:
Jeff Heaton

SpiderSQLWorkload

                         java.lang.String source)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                         java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Create a new SQL workload store and connect to a database.

Parameters:
driver - The JDBC driver to use.
source - The driver source name.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Method Detail

assignWorkload

public java.lang.String assignWorkload()
Call this method to request a URL to process. This method will return a WAITING URL and mark it as RUNNING.

Specified by:
assignWorkload in interface IWorkloadStorable
Returns:
The URL that was assigned.

addWorkload

public void addWorkload(java.lang.String url)
Add a new URL to the workload, and assign it a status of WAITING.

Specified by:
addWorkload in interface IWorkloadStorable
Parameters:
url - The URL to be added.

completeWorkload

public void completeWorkload(java.lang.String url,
                             boolean error)
Called to mark this URL as either COMPLETE or ERROR.

Specified by:
completeWorkload in interface IWorkloadStorable
Parameters:
url - The URL to complete.
error - true - assign this workload a status of ERROR. false - assign this workload a status of COMPLETE.

setStatus

protected void setStatus(java.lang.String url,
                         char status)
This is an internal method used to set the status of a given URL. This method will create a record for the URL of one does not currently exist.

Parameters:
url - The URL to set the status for.
status - What status to set.

getURLStatus

public char getURLStatus(java.lang.String url)
Get the status of a URL.

Specified by:
getURLStatus in interface IWorkloadStorable
Parameters:
url - Returns either RUNNING, ERROR WAITING, or COMPLETE. If the URL does not exist in the database, the value of UNKNOWN is returned.
Returns:
Returns either RUNNING,ERROR, WAITING,COMPLETE or UNKNOWN.

clear

public void clear()
Clear the contents of the workload store.

Specified by:
clear in interface IWorkloadStorable
